mapper.select: SELECT BASKET.user_id AS userID, BASKET.product_id AS productID, BASKET.quantity, PRODUCT.product_name AS productName, PRODUCT.price, PRODUCT.image_url AS imageUrl FROM BASKET JOIN PRODUCT USING (product_id) WHERE user_id=#{userID}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BASKET WHERE user_id = #{userID} AND product_id = #{productID}
mapper.select: SELECT quantity FROM BASKET WHERE product_id=#{productID} AND user_id=#{userID}
